comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: I've placed this photo VERY loosely on Pearse Street, but any history buffs who know of the exact location of the recruiting office, please let me know and I'll amend the map accordingly.
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 65361386@N05
comment._content: This looks like the building: maps.google.com/maps?q=Pearse+Street,+Dublin,+Ireland&... Just a few doors from the Pearse Museum at 27. Apparently the Army recruiting office was at 23, 24 & 25 - pic on: www.ihpc.ie/ihpc/Main/Enquiry.asp?iPictureID=12184&iT...

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: Thanks, that's excellent! Will move the location along the street...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
